isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - BRAKE SHOES AND/OR SPRINGS, REPLACE - FRONT BRAKES (INBOARD DRUMS)

wtsproc.wtsdescrip: BRAKE SHOES AND/OR SPRINGS, REPLACE - FRONT BRAKES (INBOARD DRUMS)

step1.para: Chock wheels.
Raise vehicle and support axle with stands.
Back off brake adjustment.
Remove wheel bearing hub cap. Catch fluid.
Remove cotter pin, adjusting nut, washer and outer bearing.
Using wheel dolly, remove wheel and hub as an assembly.
Using suitable pry tool, lift brake shoe and remove both rollers and retaining clips. Note position of clip.

warning.para: Use caution to prevent personal injury.

step1.para: Using suitable tool, remove brake shoe return spring (spring closest to brake cam).
Rotate upper shoe off spider assembly. Remove upper and lower shoes with brake shoe retaining springs attached.
Remove brake shoe retaining springs from brake shoes.
Remove anchor pins. Clean and lubricate anchor pins and bushings.
Replace wheel seal and hub cap gasket.
Install anchor pins.
Install brake return spring pin into new brake shoes.
Install brake shoe retaining springs to upper and lower shoes.
Place upper brake shoe onto spider assembly.
Rotate lower brake shoe and install brake shoe return spring using suitable tool.
Install rollers and retaining clip. Note position of clip.
Adjust brake s-cam so that the rollers are in the s-cam hollow lowest point.
Install wheel / hub assembly using wheel dolly.
Install outer bearing, washer and lock nut. Remove wheel dolly. Adjust bearing preload. Install cotter pin through lock nut.
Install hub cap and gasket. Torque bolts to spec.
Fill hub cap with fluid to proper level.
Adjust brakes on front axle.
Raise vehicle, remove stands and lower vehicle.
Remove wheel chocks.
